info.description: A DevOps platform based on golang for service monitoring, configuration center, log search, etc.
info.title: Bobber DevOps

put.summary: Query current user privilege menu trees

post.summary: Login system by username and password

parameters.description: query key or path key (split by .)
parameters.name: key

key.description: Key of the dictionary (Unique key for the same parent)

code.description: Code of the action (for example, add, edit, delete, etc.)

name.description: Name of the action (for example, Add, Edit, Delete, etc.)

path.description: Path of the resource (:id means the parameter is required)
